startscreen.connectionmsg: Your adventure begins here, please log in or register.

signinscreen.title: sign in

signupscreen.title: Registration
signupscreen.titlemsg: Please provide your phone number and a password.
signupscreen.passwordinvalidformat:
Invalid format: 
At least 8 characters. 
At least one uppercase letter. 
At least one lowercase letter.
At least one special character.
signupscreen.noemptytel: The telephone number cannot be empty
signupscreen.accountalreadyexist: An account already exist with this number

telVerificationcreen.title: Vérification de votre numéro de télephone
telVerificationcreen.titlemsg: We have sent you a verification code by SMS to your phone number. Please enter this code.
telVerificationcreen.novalidcode: the code entered is not valid
telVerificationcreen.coderenewmessage: the verification code has been renew successfully

identitycreen.title: Complete votre Profil
identitycreen.titlemsg: Please fill out this form to complete your profile

emailscreen.title: Submit your email address (2FA)
emailscreen.titlemsg: Your email address is necessary. It may be used, if necessary, for communication and security purposes.
emailscreen.verifmsg: We sended you an verification code by email. Please enter this code to verify your email adress

sponsorship.title: Get sponsored by a member
sponsorship.titlemsg: The app was recommended to you by a member ? Please search for their profile and add them as a sponsor
sponsorship.clientnotfound: No member with this referal code found
sponsorship.confirmmsg: The member linked to the number entered has been found, please enter confirm to add him as a sponsor
sponsorship.entrersponsorcode: Enter the code of your sponsor

countryScreen.title: Let's start with your country and city of residence
countryScreen.titlemsg: Please choose your country and city of residence.

passwordRecover.title: Your phone number

passwordRecover.titlemsgverif: Please enter the code received by SMS or by email
passwordRecover.titlemsgnewpassword: Please enter the code received by SMS or by email

passwordRecover.noaccoundfound: No account matches the number entered
passwordRecover.incorrectverificationcode: the code you enter is not correct
passwordRecover.passwordchangedmsg: Your new password has been successfully saved

photoProfilScreen.title: Add a profil photo
photoProfilScreen.titlemsg: Please choose a profile photo to allow your correspondents to identify you

kyc.declationtext:
I hereby declare that the information provided in this form is accurate and complete.
 I confirm that any information is found incorrect and/or incomplete that leads a violation of regulations may initiate legal actions, and I accept that I am the responsible party for any and all charges, penalties and violations.
kyc.successmsg: Thank you for submitting your information. We will examine them shortly.
kyc.addthefrontofyouridentitycard: Add the front of your identity document
kyc.addthebackofyouridentitycard: Add the back of your identity document
kyc.processingmsg: We have received your KYC information. We will analyze it shortly and keep you informed of the status of your account. Thank you.
kyc.completeyourregistrationmsg: To ensure the compliance of your account, you must complete the KYC (Know your Client) procedure.
kyc.accountvalidatedmsg: We have validated your KYC information. You now have access to all the features of the application.
